txt.en: If you are to lead a rebellion against traitorous powers, you will need to prepare. The room to the right of the refuge's entrance should serve.
Nakûr, another recent arrival, sits in the entrance to the refuge.
If you are to lead a rebellion against traitorous powers, you will need to prepare. The room to the right of the refuge's entrance should serve.
Itûr stands in the planning room to the right of the refuge's entrance.
Itûr wonders what has befallen the prisoners.
Set up chairs in the room to the right of the entrance
Set up chairs in the room to the right of the entrance
Talk to Itûr in the planning room
Talk to Itûr in the planning room
Talk to Nakûr in the entrance to the refuge
With the heroes imprisoned, it falls to Daxamat to take up the struggle!\n\n<rgb=#00FF00>Daxamat's Refuge is just west of the Waterway Market in Umbar Baharbêl, behind an unassuming door.</rgb>
Chapter 18.4: The Cage and the Captives
